articles.title: Nasa’s Lucy mission to study ‘solar system’s evolution’ launched; will fly by 8 ancient asteroids - India Today
articles.description: Lucy embarked on a 12-year-long mission to fly by one main-belt asteroid and seven Jupiter Trojan asteroids. It will study the asteroids to find out about "our solar system’s evolution".
